PERMISSIONS.TITLE: User management
PERMISSIONS.USER_EXISTS_IN_GROUP: User is already member of that group
PERMISSIONS.ORG_CREATING_INFO: The organization structure is being initialized. This may take a while, please wait a moment...
PERMISSIONS.USER_ADDED_FAILED_MULTI:
{{error}} assignement(s) failed, because users are already member
{{count}} assignment(s) done
PERMISSIONS.USER_ADDED_FAILED:
{{error}} user(s) are already member and were not added
{{count}} user(s) added to group {{group}}
PERMISSIONS.DELETE_USER_SINGLE: Are you sure you want to exclude {{name}} from this organization?
PERMISSIONS.DELETE_USER: Are you sure you want to exclude the selected users from this organization?
PERMISSIONS.DELETE_GROUP: Are you sure you want to delete the selected groups?
PERMISSIONS.DELETE_GROUP_SINGLE: Are you sure you want to delete the group {{name}}?
PERMISSIONS.DELETE_ORG_SINGLE: Are you sure you want to remove the organization {{name}}? All users remain and the organization data store will not be deleted
PERMISSIONS.INFO_GLOBAL_GROUP: You can manage all groups from all organizations as well as global groups
PERMISSIONS.INFO_GLOBAL_USER: You can manage all users from all organizations as well as global users
PERMISSIONS.INFO_ORG_GROUP: You can manage all groups from organization {{ org }}
PERMISSIONS.INFO_ORG_USER: You can manage all groups from organization {{ org }}

TOOLPERMISSION.TOOLPERMISSION_INVITE_STREAM: the permission to share objects in the stream
TOOLPERMISSION.TOOLPERMISSION_INVITE_LINK: the permission to share objects via link sharing
TOOLPERMISSION.TOOLPERMISSION_INVITE_HISTORY: the permission to use the invitation-history
TOOLPERMISSION.TOOLPERMISSION_INVITE_SHARE: the permission to share objects in shared folders
TOOLPERMISSION.TOOLPERMISSION_INVITE_ALLAUTHORITIES: the permission to share objects with all users
TOOLPERMISSION.TOOLPERMISSION_COLLECTION_EDITORIAL: the permission to create editorial collections
TOOLPERMISSION.TOOLPERMISSION_LICENSE: permission to use the license dialog
TOOLPERMISSION.TOOLPERMISSION_INVITE_SAFE: the permission to share objects in the safe
TOOLPERMISSION.TOOLPERMISSION_INVITE_SHARE_SAFE: the permission to share objects in shared folders of the safe
TOOLPERMISSION.TOOLPERMISSION_GLOBAL_AUTHORITY_SEARCH: the permission to find and invite users outside of my organisations
TOOLPERMISSION.TOOLPERMISSION_GLOBAL_AUTHORITY_SEARCH_S: the permission to find and invite users outside of my organisations in the safe
the permission to find and invite users outside of my organisations in shared folders
TOOLPERMISSION.TOOLPERMISSION_GLOBAL_AUTHORITY_SEARCH_F: the permission to find and invite users outside of my organisations without entering the complete user-ID
TOOLPERMISSION.TOOLPERMISSION_GLOBAL_AUTHORITY_SEARCH_S: the permission to find and invite users outside of my organisations in shared folders of the safe
TOOLPERMISSION.TOOLPERMISSION_COLLECTION_PINNING: the permission to create ande manage sticky collections
TOOLPERMISSION.TOOLPERMISSION_COLLECTION_CURRICULUM: the permission to create curriculum collections
TOOLPERMISSION.TOOLPERMISSION_UNCHECKEDCONTENT: the permission to display externals sources such as Youtube in the search
TOOLPERMISSION.TOOLPERMISSION_WORKSPACE: the permission to access the workspace
